Hello,

Found how to do it on my own :

in the details view of "root:contro=
ller:processors:Archiver", select
"Manually enter a Java type (class name) =
to create:" and then type in
"org.archive.modules.writer.MirrorWriterProces=
sor". Submit.

I then have some more problems :
 in the seeds, I give an UR=
L of the form "http://www.company.com"

But apparently, this gets transform=
ed into "dns:www.company.com" at
some point and in MirrorWriterProcessor.in=
nerProcess, this gets
filtered out because of the lack of http/https prefix=
.

Can someone having already used the MirrorWriter with 2.0 provide me
wit=
h some more hints ?

Thanks,

X.
